FuncDef: This command sets the context for specific forward commands to be performed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that a packet matching the entry is forwarded to an ESI-identified first appliance in the Nuage service chain using an EVPN-resolved VXLAN tunnel in the specified VPLS service.
Specifies that the packet matching the entry is forwarded using the configured SAP.
Specifies that the packet matching the entry is forwarded using the configured SDP.
Specifies an existing VPLS Ethernet SAP.
Specifies an existing VPLS service ID or service name.
